textos.txt: Welcome to the Cloud World
It may look cute and ethereal, but here lies the most precious of treasures
The documents
Documents? Up here
I was expecting rain, rainbows, maybe unicorns
Ah, my dear, in the clouds we also store data, results, and evidence of competence
You are now in the sector where technical records and test reports rest
But be careful, a poorly versioned document can cause a storm of non-conformities
Okay... let me get this straight
I'm literally walking on clouds, looking for technical records and facing paper monsters
Almost that
You will face the Shadows of Filing, dodge whirlwinds of obsolete versions, and identify controlled documents
Oh, and before I forget... the **Blue Potions**
These potions contain a compound as light as helium and as powerful as hydrogen
When you drink one, your jump is boosted perfect for reaching distant clouds and unstable platforms
Without them, some documents will remain out of reach... like lost reports without backup
Now that makes sense. Potions powered by chemistry... I like it
Time to apply my technical knowledge and rise to the skies
Organize, control, record, and report... These are the four winds that will carry you to the next world
And if you see a Ghost Document, don't read it. It might be an unauthorized version
Before you go, keep this tip like a ray of sunlight: every document must be identified, updated, and properly made available
Now go, and shine light upon these clouds with the power of conformity
